item.title: Making a new tab?
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

You have to have it send to the proper packet, what packet sends when you click the button? Use that as the case number.

item.title: Making a new tab?
item.dc:creator: @_Pure_Pwnage ~!Pure Pwnage!~
item.description:
@_Pure_Pwnage wrote:

im trying to make summoning, but i don’t know how to make things show up in the music tab…

and when i try and make it work in the quest tab it doesnt do anything.

	case 7341: //North Wall 
				{
				sendMessage("You build a north wall");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				AddGlobalObject(absX, absY, 2854, -1, 0); //North wall
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				}
	break;

whats wrong?
